testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the first value that can be parsed as a time is assigned to the transition-duration,the second is transition-delay

spec.spec_statement: note that order is important in this property. The first value that can be parsed as a time is assigned to the transition-duration. The second value that can be parsed as a time is assigned to transition-delay

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-delay value is 0s

testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-delay value is 4s and 1s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if a negative value for transition-duration is treated as 0

spec.spec_statement: a negative value for transition-duration is treated as ‘0’.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if the remove of transition properties can work properly

step.step_desc: Removes the transition properties while the transition is running, then adds them back in.
step.expected: Transitions should start from the beginning

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if changes transition-duration while the transition is running to ensure that the running transition is not affected

step.step_desc: Changes transition-duration while the transition is running
step.expected: The running transition is not affected
